sentences.sContent: What can we learn from these meager facts?
sentences.sContent_eng: What can we learn from these meager facts?
sentences.sCn: 从这些贫乏的材料我们可以了解什么呢？

sentences.sContent: It was medieval European monks who introduced scientific brewing techniques in an effort to produce a nutritious beverage to supplement their meager diets.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was medieval European monks who introduced scientific brewing techniques in an effort to produce a nutritious beverage to supplement their meager diets.
sentences.sCn: 正是中世纪欧洲的僧侣们引进科学的啤酒酿造技术，制造有营养的饮料，从而补充了他们贫乏的饮食。

remMethod.val: m + eager (热心的) → 光靠热心解决不了贫乏 → 缺乏的
